text: In 2008, US children got 36 vaccines and the autism rate was 1 in 150.
In 2013, US children got 46 vaccines and the autism rate was 1 in 88.
In 1983, US children got 10 vaccines and the autism rate was 1 in 10,000.
As the number of vaccines administered to children has increased in the United States, so has the autism rate.
